pages.text: Although there are a greater variation of biomes in Au Naturel, the humble horse may yet provide a relatively efficient mode of transport.  Tame them and use them to overcome some of the limitations of human stamina and speed.
The saddle, naturally of course, is now craftable from 5 pieces of leather, two string, and two iron ingots.  There is, however, practically no horse armour in Au Naturel, so don't get too gung-ho.
